item.title: Consumer confidence dented by stock-market worries and threat of Trump tariffs
item.description: Consumer confidence index falls to 3-month low

item.title: 10-year Treasury yield edges up to kick off holiday-shortened week
item.description: Treasury yields edged higher on Monday, with the key 10-year rate hovering above 4.5%, after data showed U.S. consumer confidence pulled back in Decem...

item.title: Two-year U.S. manufacturing slump shows little sign of ending
item.description: Durable-goods orders fall for third time in four months. Report comes out a day early following Christmas Eve executive order by Biden.

item.title: Nordstrom to go private after doing the math on facing bigger rivals
item.description: Retailer has been publicly traded since 1971 but said it sees better growth prospects ahead as a private business.
